:value.description: Option value (if not filled, it will be taken from the content)
:value.description_zh: 选项值（如不填，会从内容中获取）

:label.description: Option label (if not filled, it will be taken from the content)
:label.description_zh: 选项标签（如不填，会从内容中获取）

:tag-props.description: The label properties of the display

:extra.description: Additional data. Version 2.18.0 is deprecated and data can be extended with value as an object
:extra.description_zh: 额外数据。2.18.0 版本废弃，可使用对象形式的 value 扩展数据

:index.description_zh: 用于手动指定选项的 index
